tool_description: Manages user subscription plans including upgrades, downgrades, cancellations, and renewal settings.

action.description: Action to perform: subscribe, upgrade, downgrade, cancel, renew, pause

effective_date.description: When the subscription change should take effect

proration.description: Whether to apply prorated billing for plan changes

error_messages: Invalid action: Use one of [subscribe, upgrade, downgrade, cancel, renew, pause].
Plan not available: The specified plan_id is not available for this account.
Active subscription required: Account must have an active subscription for this action.
Invalid effective date: Effective date must be in the future and within allowed range.
Billing issue: Cannot process subscription change due to billing problems.
usage: Specify account_id and action to manage subscriptions. For plan changes, provide plan_id. Optionally set effective_date, auto_renew, and proration preferences.
